extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic, clinical and biomarker data of the population
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Data are presented as mean (± standard deviation), except for the age range (years), HCA scores (n), and APOEɛ4 carriers (%). MMSE scores were only considered when the time lap between MMSE and the MRI scan was equal to or less than three months. An independent sample t-test was performed to compare the age, MMSE scores and CSF biomarker levels of the groups. Mann-Whitney U-tests were used to compare HCA and % APOEɛ4 carriers between the groups. AD, Alzheimer’s disease; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; CO, control; n, number; MoCA, Montreal Cognitive Assessment; APOE, apolipoprotein E; CSF, cerebrospinal fluid; HCA, hippocampal atrophy. ***p < 0.001.

caption.p: Demographic, clinical and biomarker data of the population

table-wrap-foot.p: Data are presented as mean (± standard deviation), except for the age range (years), HCA scores (n), and APOEɛ4 carriers (%). MMSE scores were only considered when the time lap between MMSE and the MRI scan was equal to or less than three months. An independent sample t-test was performed to compare the age, MMSE scores and CSF biomarker levels of the groups. Mann-Whitney U-tests were used to compare HCA and % APOEɛ4 carriers between the groups. AD, Alzheimer’s disease; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; CO, control; n, number; MoCA, Montreal Cognitive Assessment; APOE, apolipoprotein E; CSF, cerebrospinal fluid; HCA, hippocampal atrophy. ***p < 0.001.

extracted-table.table-caption: Brain regions with one or more clusters reaching statistical significance (p < 0.05) after FWE correction on cluster level for multiple comparison in AD versus CO
